segment.source: After planning and then deploying Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you can configure and use it to manage BitLocker Drive Encryption across your enterprise.
segment.target: After planning and then deploying Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you can configure and use it to manage BitLocker Drive Encryption across your enterprise.

segment.source: The information in this section describes post-installation, day-to-day BitLocker encryption management tasks that are accomplished by using Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring.
segment.target: The information in this section describes post-installation, day-to-day BitLocker encryption management tasks that are accomplished by using Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring.

segment.source: Reset a TPM lockout
segment.target: Reset a TPM lockout

segment.source: A Trusted Platform Module (TPM) is a microchip that is designed to provide basic security-related functions, primarily involving encryption keys.
segment.target: A Trusted Platform Module (TPM) is a microchip that is designed to provide basic security-related functions, primarily involving encryption keys.

segment.source: The TPM is usually installed on the motherboard of a computer, and it communicates with the rest of the system by using a host bus adapter.
segment.target: The TPM is usually installed on the motherboard of a computer, and it communicates with the rest of the system by using a host bus adapter.

segment.source: On computers that incorporate a TPM, you can create cryptographic keys and encrypt them so that they can be decrypted only by the TPM.
segment.target: On computers that incorporate a TPM, you can create cryptographic keys and encrypt them so that they can be decrypted only by the TPM.

segment.source: A TPM lockout can occur if a user enters the incorrect PIN too many times.
segment.target: A TPM lockout can occur if a user enters the incorrect PIN too many times.

segment.source: The number of times that a user can enter an incorrect PIN before the TPM locks varies by manufacturer.
segment.target: The number of times that a user can enter an incorrect PIN before the TPM locks varies by manufacturer.

segment.source: You can use MBAM to access the centralized key recovery data system on the Administration and Monitoring Website, where you can retrieve a TPM owner password file when you supply a computer ID and an associated user identifier.
segment.target: You can use MBAM to access the centralized key recovery data system on the Administration and Monitoring Website, where you can retrieve a TPM owner password file when you supply a computer ID and an associated user identifier.

segment.source: Recover drives
segment.target: Recover drives

segment.source: When you are dealing with the encryption of data, especially in an enterprise environment, consider how that data can be recovered in the event of a hardware failure, changes in personnel, or other situations in which encryption keys can be lost.
segment.target: When you are dealing with the encryption of data, especially in an enterprise environment, consider how that data can be recovered in the event of a hardware failure, changes in personnel, or other situations in which encryption keys can be lost.

segment.source: The encrypted drive recovery features in MBAM ensure that data can be captured and stored and that the required tools are available to access a BitLocker-protected volume when BitLocker goes into recovery mode, is moved, or becomes corrupted.
segment.target: The encrypted drive recovery features in MBAM ensure that data can be captured and stored and that the required tools are available to access a BitLocker-protected volume when BitLocker goes into recovery mode, is moved, or becomes corrupted.
